再構成: (さいこうせい) - reconstruction; reorganization; reorganisation; reconstitution; reconfiguration
再注目: (さいちゅうもく) - being in the center of attention again; coming back into the limelight
再洗礼: (さいせんれい) - baptism by sprinkling
再浸礼: (さいしんれい) - rebaptism by immersion
再演: (さいえん) - another showing (of a play); recapitulation
再犯: (さいはん) - second offense; second offence
再現: (さいげん) - reappearance; reproduction; return; revival
再現性: (さいげんせい) - reproducibility; repeatability; duplicability
再現率: (さいげんりつ) - recall; recall factor; recall ratio
再生: (saisei) - resuscitation, regeneration, restoration to life; reformation, rehabilitation , resuscitation, regeneration, restoration to life; reformation, rehabilitation; playback, regeneration (som, etc.), view (of a video clip); reclamation, recovery
再生不良性貧血: (さいせいふりょうせいひんけつ) - aplastic anemia; aplastic anaemia
再生保証領域: (さいせいほしょうりょういき) - assured reproduction area
再生医療: (さいせいいりょう) - regenerative medicine
再生可能エネルギー: (さいせいかのうエネルギー) - renewable energy
再生可能資源: (さいせいかのうしげん) - renewable resource
再生法: (さいせいほう) - regeneration process; rehabilitation method; recovery
再生繊維: (さいせいせんい) - regenerated fiber; regenerated fibre
再生速度: (さいせいそくど) - replay speed/playback speed; refresh rate
再発足: (さいほっそく) - restart; fresh start
再発防止: (さいはつぼうし) - preventive measure; recurrence prevention; relapse prevention
再直接尋問: (さいちょくせつじんもん) - redirect examination
再確認: (さいかくにん) - reaffirmation; reconfirmation; revalidation
再禁止: (さいきんし) - reimposition of an embargo; reprohibition
再稼動: (さいかどう) - restarting; resuming operations (e.g. at a power plant)
再結成: (さいけっせい) - reforming; reuniting; getting back together (band, etc.)
再編成: (さいへんせい) - reorganization; reorganisation; reshuffle
再編計画: (さいへんけいかく) - reorganization plan; reorganisation plan
再臨: (さいりん) - second coming; second advent
再葬墓: (さいそうぼ) - secondary grave (usu. for disinterred and washed bones); reburial grave
再表示制御: (さいひょうじせいぎょ) - display recall control
再見: (ツァイチエン) - good-bye (chi: zàijiàn); see you
再訂版: (さいていばん) - second revised edition
再訪問率: (さいほうもんりつ) - revisit rate (e.g. for WWW sites); visitor retention rate
再設定: (さいせってい) - reestablish; reset (a password)
再評価: (さいひょうか) - reassessment; reappraisal; reevaluation; revaluation
再試合: (さいしあい) - resumption of a game
再試行: (さいしこう) - (often in a computing context) retry; trying again
再認識: (さいにんしき) - recognizing anew; seeing something in a new light
再誕: (さいたん) - resurrection (of a company or school, etc.)
再読文字: (さいどくもじ) - (e.g. 将 is read as「まさに...んとす」)  single kanji that is read twice (with different pronunciations) in the Japanese reading of Chinese texts
再販売価格: (さいはんばいかかく) - resale price
再資源化: (さいしげんか) - recycling; resource recovery
再起: (さいき) - comeback; recovery; restoration; rally; reflexive (in grammar)
再起不能: (さいきふのう) - (yoji) being beyond recovery; having no hope of recovery
